ov1720.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*********************************************************************
00002 
00003   Name:         ov1720.c
00004   Created by:   Pierre-A. Amaudruz / K.Olchanski
00005                     implementation of the CAENCommLib functions
00006   Contents:     V1720 8 ch. 12bit 250Msps for Optical link
00007   MAIN_ENABLE Build : ov1720.c, v1720.h, ov1720drv.h
00008    > gcc -g -O2 -Wall -DDO_TIMING -DMAIN_ENABLE -o ov1720.exe ov1720.c -lCAENComm -lrt 
00009   Operation:
00010   > ./ov1720 -l 100 -l 0 -b 0
00011   > ./ov1720 -l 10000 -m 100 -l 1 -b 0
00012 
00013   $Id: ov1720.c 5267 2012-03-02 17:45:14Z svn $
00014 *********************************************************************/
00015 #include <stdio.h>
00016 #include <stdlib.h>
00017 #include <string.h>
00018 #include <sys/time.h>
00019 #include "ov1720drv.h"
00020 
00021 #define LARGE_NUMBER 10000000
00022 // Buffer organization map for number of samples
00023 uint32_t V1720_NSAMPLES_MODE[11] = { (1<<20), (1<<19), (1<<18), (1<<17), (1<<16), (1<<15)
00024               ,(1<<14), (1<<13), (1<<12), (1<<11), (1<<10)};
00025 
00026 /*****************************************************************/
00027 CAENComm_ErrorCode ov1720_ChannelSet(int handle, uint32_t channel, uint32_t what, uint32_t that)
00028 {
00029   uint32_t reg, mask;
00030 
00031   if (what == V1720_CHANNEL_THRESHOLD)   mask = 0x0FFF;
00032   if (what == V1720_CHANNEL_OUTHRESHOLD) mask = 0x0FFF;
00033   if (what == V1720_CHANNEL_DAC)         mask = 0xFFFF;
00034   reg = what | (channel << 8);
00035   return CAENComm_Write32(handle, reg, (that & 0xFFF));
00036 }
00037 
00038 /*****************************************************************/
00039 CAENComm_ErrorCode ov1720_ChannelGet(int handle, uint32_t channel, uint32_t what, uint32_t *data)
00040 {
00041   uint32_t reg, mask;
00042 
00043   if (what == V1720_CHANNEL_THRESHOLD)   mask = 0x0FFF;
00044   if (what == V1720_CHANNEL_OUTHRESHOLD) mask = 0x0FFF;
00045   if (what == V1720_CHANNEL_DAC)         mask = 0xFFFF;
00046   reg = what | (channel << 8);
00047   return CAENComm_Read32(handle, reg, data);
00048 }
00049 
00050 /*****************************************************************/
00051 CAENComm_ErrorCode ov1720_ChannelThresholdSet(int handle, uint32_t channel, uint32_t threshold)
00052 {
00053   uint32_t reg;
00054   reg = V1720_CHANNEL_THRESHOLD | (channel << 8);
00055   printf("reg:0x%x, threshold:%x\n", reg, threshold);
00056   return CAENComm_Write32(handle, reg,(threshold & 0xFFF));
00057 }
00058 
00059 /*****************************************************************/
00060 CAENComm_ErrorCode ov1720_ChannelOUThresholdSet(int handle, uint32_t channel, uint32_t threshold)
00061 {
00062   uint32_t reg;
00063   reg = V1720_CHANNEL_OUTHRESHOLD | (channel << 8);
00064   printf("reg:0x%x, outhreshold:%x\n", reg, threshold);
00065   return CAENComm_Write32(handle, reg, (threshold & 0xFFF));
00066 }
00067 
00068 /*****************************************************************/
00069 CAENComm_ErrorCode ov1720_ChannelDACSet(int handle, uint32_t channel, uint32_t dac)
00070 {
00071   uint32_t reg, status, ncount;
00072   
00073   if ((channel >= 0) && (channel < 8)) {
00074     reg = V1720_CHANNEL_STATUS | (channel << 8);
00075     ncount = 10000;
00076     do {
00077       CAENComm_Read32(handle, reg, &status);
00078     } while ((status & 0x04) && (ncount--));
00079     if (ncount == 0) return -1;
00080     reg = V1720_CHANNEL_DAC | (channel << 8);
00081     printf("reg:0x%x, DAC:%x\n", reg, dac);
00082     return CAENComm_Write32(handle, reg, (dac & 0xFFFF));
00083   }
00084   return -1;
00085 }
00086 
00087 /*****************************************************************/
00088 CAENComm_ErrorCode ov1720_ChannelDACGet(int handle, uint32_t channel, uint32_t *dac)
00089 {
00090   uint32_t reg;
00091   CAENComm_ErrorCode sCAEN = -1;
00092 
00093   if ((channel >= 0) && (channel < 8)) {
00094     reg = V1720_CHANNEL_DAC | (channel << 8);
00095     sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle, reg, dac);
00096   }
00097   return sCAEN;
00098 }
00099 
00100 /*****************************************************************/
00101 CAENComm_ErrorCode ov1720_AcqCtl(int handle, uint32_t operation)
00102 {
00103   uint32_t reg;
00104   CAENComm_ErrorCode sCAEN;
00105   
00106   sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, &reg);
00107   //  printf("sCAEN:%d ACQ Acq Control:0x%x\n", sCAEN, reg);
00108 
00109   switch (operation) {
00110   case V1720_RUN_START:
00111     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg | 0x4));
00112     break;
00113   case V1720_RUN_STOP:
00114     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg & ~( 0x4)));
00115     break;
00116   case V1720_REGISTER_RUN_MODE:
00117     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, 0x0);
00118     break;
00119   case V1720_SIN_RUN_MODE:
00120     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, 0x1);
00121     break;
00122   case V1720_SIN_GATE_RUN_MODE:
00123     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, 0x2);
00124     break;
00125   case V1720_MULTI_BOARD_SYNC_MODE:
00126     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, 0x3);
00127     break;
00128   case V1720_COUNT_ACCEPTED_TRIGGER:
00129     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg & ~( 0x8)));
00130     break;
00131   case V1720_COUNT_ALL_TRIGGER:
00132     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, (reg | 0x8));
00133     break;
00134   default:
00135     printf("operation not defined\n");
00136     break;
00137   }
00138   return sCAEN;
00139 }
00140 
00141 /*****************************************************************/
00142 CAENComm_ErrorCode ov1720_ChannelConfig(int handle, uint32_t operation)
00143 {
00144   CAENComm_ErrorCode sCAEN;
00145   uint32_t reg, cfg;
00146   
00147   sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle, V1720_CHANNEL_CONFIG, &reg);  
00148   sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle, V1720_CHANNEL_CONFIG, &cfg);  
00149   //  printf("Channel_config1: 0x%x\n", cfg);  
00150 
00151   switch (operation) {
00152   case V1720_TRIGGER_UNDERTH:
00153     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_CHANNEL_CFG_BIT_SET, 0x40);
00154     break;
00155   case V1720_TRIGGER_OVERTH:
00156     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_CHANNEL_CFG_BIT_CLR, 0x40);
00157     break;
00158   case V1720_PACK25_ENABLE:
00159     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_CHANNEL_CONFIG, (reg | 0x800));
00160     break;
00161   case V1720_PACK25_DISABLE:
00162     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_CHANNEL_CONFIG, (reg & ~(0x800)));
00163     break;
00164   case V1720_NO_ZERO_SUPPRESSION:
00165     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_CHANNEL_CONFIG, (reg & ~(0xF000)));
00166     break;
00167   case V1720_ZLE:
00168     reg &= ~(0xF000);
00169     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_CHANNEL_CONFIG, (reg | 0x2000));
00170     break;
00171   case V1720_ZS_AMP:
00172     reg &= ~(0xF000);
00173     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_CHANNEL_CONFIG, (reg | 0x3000));
00174     break;
00175   default:
00176     break;
00177   }
00178   sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle, V1720_CHANNEL_CONFIG, &cfg);  
00179   //  printf("Channel_config2: 0x%x\n", cfg);
00180   return sCAEN;
00181 }
00182 
00183 /*****************************************************************/
00184 CAENComm_ErrorCode ov1720_info(int handle, int *nchannels, uint32_t *data)
00185 {
00186   CAENComm_ErrorCode sCAEN;
00187   int i, chanmask;
00188   uint32_t reg;
00189 
00190   // Evaluate the event size
00191   // Number of samples per channels
00192   sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle, V1720_BUFFER_ORGANIZATION, &reg);  
00193   *data = V1720_NSAMPLES_MODE[reg];
00194 
00195   // times the number of active channels
00196   sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle, V1720_CHANNEL_EN_MASK, &reg);  
00197   chanmask = 0xff & reg; 
00198   *nchannels = 0;
00199   for (i=0;i<8;i++) {
00200     if (chanmask & (1<<i))
00201       *nchannels += 1;
00202   }
00203 
00204   *data *= *nchannels;
00205   *data /= 2;   // 2 samples per 32bit word
00206   *data += 4;   // Headers
00207   return sCAEN;
00208 }
00209 
00210 /*****************************************************************/
00211 CAENComm_ErrorCode ov1720_BufferOccupancy(int handle, uint32_t channel, uint32_t *data)
00212 {
00213   uint32_t reg;
00214 
00215   reg = V1720_BUFFER_OCCUPANCY + (channel<<16);
00216   return  CAENComm_Read32(handle, reg, data);  
00217 }
00218 
00219 /*****************************************************************/
00220 CAENComm_ErrorCode ov1720_BufferFree(int handle, int nbuffer, uint32_t *mode)
00221 {
00222   CAENComm_ErrorCode sCAEN;
00223 
00224   sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle, V1720_BUFFER_ORGANIZATION, mode);  
00225   if (nbuffer <= (1 << *mode) ) {
00226     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle,V1720_BUFFER_FREE, nbuffer);
00227     return sCAEN;
00228   } else
00229     return sCAEN;
00230 }
00231 
00232 /*****************************************************************/
00233 CAENComm_ErrorCode ov1720_Status(int handle)
00234 {
00235   CAENComm_ErrorCode sCAEN;
00236   uint32_t reg;
00237 
00238   printf("================================================\n");
00239   sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle, V1720_BOARD_ID, &reg);  
00240   printf("Board ID             : 0x%x\n", reg);
00241   sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle, V1720_BOARD_INFO, &reg);  
00242   printf("Board Info           : 0x%x\n", reg);
00243   sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL, &reg);  
00244   printf("Acquisition control  : 0x%8.8x\n", reg);
00245   sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle, V1720_ACQUISITION_STATUS, &reg);  
00246   printf("Acquisition status         : 0x%8.8x\n", reg);
00247   sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle, V1720_CHANNEL_CONFIG, &reg);  
00248   printf("Channel Configuration      : 0x%5.5x\n", reg);
00249   sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle, V1720_TRIG_SRCE_EN_MASK, &reg);  
00250   printf("Trigger Source Enable Mask : 0x%8.8x\n", reg);
00251   sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle, V1720_VME_STATUS, &reg);  
00252   printf("VME Status                 : 0x%x\n", reg);
00253   sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle, V1720_EVENT_STORED, &reg);  
00254   printf("Event Stored               : 0x%8.8x\n", reg);
00255   printf("================================================\n");
00256   return sCAEN;
00257 }
00258 
00259 /*****************************************************************/
00260 /**
00261 Sets all the necessary paramters for a given configuration.
00262 The configuration is provided by the mode argument.
00263 Add your own configuration in the case statement. Let me know
00264 your setting if you want to include it in the distribution.
00265 - <b>Mode 1</b> : 
00266 
00267 @param *mvme VME structure
00268 @param  base Module base address
00269 @param mode  Configuration mode number
00270 @return 0: OK. -1: Bad
00271 */
00272 CAENComm_ErrorCode  ov1720_Setup(int handle, int mode)
00273 {
00274   CAENComm_ErrorCode sCAEN;
00275   switch (mode) {
00276   case 0x0:
00277     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00278     printf("Setup Skip\n");
00279     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00280   case 0x1:
00281     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00282     printf("Trigger from FP, 8ch, 1Ks, postTrigger 800\n");
00283     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00284     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_BUFFER_ORGANIZATION,   0x0A);    // 1K buffer
00285     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_TRIG_SRCE_EN_MASK,     0x4000);  // External Trigger
00286     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_CHANNEL_EN_MASK,       0xFF);    // 8ch enable
00287     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_POST_TRIGGER_SETTING,  800);     // PreTrigger (1K-800)
00288     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_ACQUISITION_CONTROL,   0x00);    // Reset Acq Control
00289     printf("\n");
00290     break;
00291   case 0x2:
00292     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00293     printf("Trigger from LEMO\n");
00294     printf("--------------------------------------------\n");
00295     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle, V1720_BUFFER_ORGANIZATION, 1);
00296     printf("\n");
00297     break;
00298   default:
00299     printf("Unknown setup mode\n");
00300     return -1;
00301   }
00302   return ov1720_Status(handle);
00303 }

00307 #ifdef MAIN_ENABLE
00308 int main (int argc, char* argv[]) {
00309 
00310   /* Lock the process to an arbitrary core (#3)
00311   int mask = 0x04;
00312   if( sched_setaffinity(0, sizeof(mask), &mask) < 0 )
00313   {
00314     printf("ERROR: affinity not set\n");

00316   */

00319   int handle[2];
00320   int nw, l=0, c=0, d=0, h=0, Nh;
00321   uint32_t i, lcount, data[50000], temp, lam, reg;
00322   int Nmodulo=10;
00323   int tcount=0, eloop=0;
00324   uint32_t   *pdata, eStored, eSize;
00325   int loop, Nloop=10;
00326   int bshowData=0;
00327   int debug = 0;

00329   struct timeval t1;
00330   int   dt1, savelcount=0;
00331   // Added to test optivca communication (Alex 26/02/12)
00332   int testCom    = 0;
00333   uint32_t regRd = 0;
00334 
00335    /* get parameters */
00336    /* parse command line parameters */
00337   for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00338     if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 'd')
00339       debug = 1;
00340     else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-s", 2) == 0)
00341       bshowData = 1;
00342     else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-t", 2) == 0)
00343       testCom = 1;
00344     else if (argv[i][0] == '-') {
00345       if (i + 1 >= argc || argv[i + 1][0] == '-')
00346         goto usage;
00347       if (strncmp(argv[i], "-l", 2) == 0)
00348         Nloop =  (atoi(argv[++i]));
00349       else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-o", 2) == 0)
00350         l =  (atoi(argv[++i]));
00351       else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-b", 2) == 0)
00352         d =  (atoi(argv[++i]));
00353       else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-c", 2) == 0)

00355       else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-m", 2) == 0)
00356         Nmodulo =  (atoi(argv[++i]));
00357       else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-d", 2) == 0)
00358         d =  (atoi(argv[++i]));
00359     } else {
00360     usage:
00361       printf("usage: ov1720 -l (loop count) \n");
00362       printf("              -o link#\n");
00363       printf("              -b board#\n");
00364       printf("              -c interface# (PCIe)\n");
00365       printf("              -d daisy#\n");
00366       printf("              -m modulo display\n");
00367       printf("              -s show data\n");
00368       printf("              -t test communication\n\n");
00369       return 0;
00370          }
00371   }
00372   
00373   //  printf("in ov1720, l %d, d %d, c %d\n", l, d, c);
00374   
00375 #if 1
00376 
00377   // Test board communication (Alex 26/02/12)
00378   if(testCom == 1) {
00379     // Open devices
00380     sCAEN = CAENComm_OpenDevice(CAENComm_PCIE_OpticalLink, l, d, c, &(handle[h])); 
00381     if (sCAEN != CAENComm_Success) {
00382       sCAEN = CAENComm_CloseDevice(handle[h]); 
00383       printf("Com Test Fail Type One\n");

00390         sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle[h], reg, &regRd);
00391         printf("/0x%x", regRd);
00392       }
00393       printf(" Com Test Success \n");

00408   sCAEN = CAENComm_OpenDevice(CAENComm_PCIE_OpticalLink, l, d, c, &(handle[h])); 
00409   if (sCAEN != CAENComm_Success) {
00410     handle[h] = -1;

00428     handle[h] = -1;
00429     printf("2nd CAENComm_OpenDevice [l:%d, d:%d]: Error %d\n", l, d, sCAEN);

00433     h++;
00434   }
00435   Nh = h;

00448       sCAEN = CAENComm_OpenDevice(CAENComm_PCIE_OpticalLink, l, d, c, &(handle[h]));

00462 #if 1
00463   for (h=0;h<Nh;h++) {
00464     
00465     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00466     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00467     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00468     // sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle[h], V1720_SW_RESET              , 0);

00472

00474     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle[h], V1720_CHANNEL_CONFIG        , 0x10);
00475     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle[h], V1720_BUFFER_ORGANIZATION   , 0xa);
00476     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle[h], V1720_CHANNEL_EN_MASK       , 0x3);
00477     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle[h], V1720_TRIG_SRCE_EN_MASK     , 0x40000000);
00478     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle[h], V1720_MONITOR_MODE          , 0x3);  // buffer occupancy
00479     // 
00480     // Set Channel threshold
00481     for (i=0;i<8;i++) {
00482       ov1720_ChannelSet(handle[h], i, V1720_CHANNEL_THRESHOLD, 0x820);
00483       sCAEN = ov1720_ChannelGet(handle[h], i, V1720_CHANNEL_THRESHOLD, &temp);
00484       printf("Board: %d Threshold[%i] = %d \n", h, i, temp);
00485     }
00486 
00487     //
00488     // Set DAC value
00489     for (i=0;i<8;i++) {
00490       sCAEN = ov1720_ChannelDACSet(handle[h], i, 0x88b8);
00491       sCAEN = ov1720_ChannelDACGet(handle[h], i, &temp);
00492       printf("Board :%d DAC[%i] = %d \n", h, i, temp);
00493     }

00495   }
00496   printf("Modules configured\n");
00497 
00498 
00499   // Start boards
00500   for (h=0;h<Nh;h++) {
00501     if (handle[h] < 0) continue;   // Skip unconnected board
00502     // Start run then wait for trigger
00503     sCAEN = CAENComm_Write32(handle[h], V1720_SW_CLEAR, 0);
00504     sleep(1);
00505     ov1720_AcqCtl(handle[h], V1720_RUN_START);
00506   }  
00507   
00508   printf("Modules started\n");
00509  
00510   for (loop=0;loop<Nloop;loop++) {
00511     do {
00512       sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle[0], V1720_ACQUISITION_STATUS, &lam);
00513       //printf("lam:0x%x, sCAEN:%d\n",lam, sCAEN);
00514       lam &= 0x8;
00515     } while (lam == 0);
00516 
00517     // Read all modules
00518     for (h=0; h<Nh; h++) {
00519       // Skip unconnected devices
00520       if (handle[h] < 0) continue;   // Skip unconnected board
00521       
00522       // Check if data ready
00523       lcount=LARGE_NUMBER;
00524       do {
00525         sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle[h], V1720_VME_STATUS, &lam);
00526         lam &= 0x1;
00527       } while ((lam==0) && (lcount--));
00528       if (h==1) savelcount = LARGE_NUMBER - lcount;
00529       if (lcount == 0) {
00530         printf("timeout on LAM for module %d\n", h);
00531         goto out;
00532       }
00533       // buffer info
00534       sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle[h], V1720_EVENT_STORED, &eStored);
00535       sCAEN = CAENComm_Read32(handle[h], V1720_EVENT_SIZE, &eSize);
00536       
00537       // Some info display
00538       if ((h==0) && ((loop % Nmodulo) == 0)) {
00539         gettimeofday(&t1, NULL);
00540         ct = t1.tv_sec * 1e6 + t1.tv_usec;
00541         dt1 = ct-pct;
00542         pct = ct;
00543         printf("B:%02d Hndle:%d sCAEN:%d Evt#:%d Event Stored:0x%x Event Size:0x%x try:%d KB/s:%6.2f BLTl:%d\n"
00544                , h, handle[h], sCAEN, loop, eStored, eSize, savelcount, (float) 1e3*tcount/dt1, eloop);
00545         tcount = 0;
00546       }
00547       
00548       // Read data
00549       pdata = &data[0];
00550       eloop = 0;
00551       do {
00552         sCAEN = CAENComm_BLTRead(handle[h], V1720_EVENT_READOUT_BUFFER, pdata, eSize < 1028 ? eSize : 1028, &nw);
00553         eSize -= nw;
00554         pdata += nw;
00555         tcount += nw;  // debugging
00556         eloop++;       // debugging
00557       } while (eSize);
00558       
00559       if (bshowData) printf("Module:%d nw:%d data: 0x%8.8x 0x%8.8x 0x%8.8x 0x%8.8x 0x%8.8x 0x%8.8x 0x%8.8x 0x%8.8x\n"
00560                             ,h , nw, data[0], data[1], data[2], data[3], data[4], data[5], data[6], data[7]);
00561     } // loop over Nh
00562     
00563     //    printf("Modules all readout\n");
00564   }
00565 
00566 #endif
00567 
00568 #if 0
00569   Address = V1720_EVENT_READOUT_BUFFER;
00570   CAENComm_MultiRead32(handle, &Address, status/4, &(data[0]), &sCAEN);
00571   printf("sCAEN:%d MultiRead32 length:0x%x\n", sCAEN, status/4);
00572 #endif
00573 
00574 #if 0
00575   // SCAEN returns -13 when no more data, nw on the -13 returns the remain
00576   Address = V1720_EVENT_READOUT_BUFFER;
00577   for (i=0;i<32;i++) {
00578     sCAEN = CAENComm_BLTRead(handle, Address, &(data[0]), 512, &nw);
00579     printf("sCAEN:%d BLTRead length:0x%x\n", sCAEN, nw);
00580     if (nw == 0) break;
00581   }
00582 #endif
00583   
00584 #if 0
00585   Address = V1720_EVENT_READOUT_BUFFER;
00586   for (i=0;i<32;i++) {
00587     sCAEN = CAENComm_MBLTRead(handle, Address, &(data[0]), 128, &nw);
00588     printf("sCAEN:%d MBLTRead length:0x%x\n", sCAEN, nw);
00589     if (nw == 0) break;
00590   }
00591 #endif
00592   
00593 #if 0
00594   for (i=0;i<nw;i++) {
00595     printf(" Data[%d] = 0x%8.8x\n", i, data[i]);
00596   }
00597 #endif
00598 
00599   // Exit port
00600  out:
00601   for (h=0;h<Nh;h++) {
00602     sCAEN = ov1720_AcqCtl(handle[h], V1720_RUN_STOP);
00603   }
00604   printf("Modules stopped\n");
00605 
00606   for (h=0;h<Nh;h++) {
00607     sCAEN = CAENComm_CloseDevice(handle[h]); 
00608   }
00609   printf("Handles released\n");
00610 
00611   return 1;
00612 
00613 }
00614 #endif
00615

00623  */
